content: As a life long horseman I can tell you this. The outside of a horse is real good for the inside of a man. I too will certainly support the Wildcatter Ranch if I ever head that way. I salute them. I am truly impressed with their putting their money where there mouth is when offering concern about our military.

title: Wounded Warriors at Home on the Range
